title: Riot ! Fix your game !
body: Okay... So i started normal game and my game crashed before the loading screen ?! When i click **RECONNECT** its the same ( **Bug Splat error **) Tell me what happen ! First in **EUW** my screen was black in the loading screen and suddenly we lost because of **/remake** and now in **EUNE** i cant even get in game... Now i closed League and i am waiting to apply patch and probably they will use **remake** again because of this ! **This happened after the launch of 6.15 patch !**

replies.body:
It sounds like you are having a series of problems which might include a problem connecting to our servers as well as an issue with your game files rendering properly.  Rineyy provided two guides that can help with both of these cases.  As a first step, I recommend going over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to resolve this.  Completing this successfully should solve the black screen and get you loaded into game.  

If you are still experiencing bug splats, it's possible that your game files have become corrupt.  Our[ Game Crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) guide will also provide resolution steps which might require repairing corrupt files.

Let me know how this goes for you, I'm happy to help!
